name: Get To Me
description:
A submission for the 2021 GMTK game jam (my first game jam and first game ever, too)

Get To Me is a small platformer-esque game that is dominated by the electrostatic force (and gravity, I guess). 

You must propel and attract between many different charged objects in order to give yourself mobility. The only abilities you have are changing your charge sign and moving left or right - that's it.

The controls are simple, but the implications are many - this is by no means an easy game, and there will be parts that may beat you and make you quit ;)

Get To Me is comprised of 5 difficult levels in total (minus the tutorial level) and it can take anywhere from 10 - 40 minutes to finish depending on your skill.

Controls:

  • A / D: Move Left / Right
  • S: Change your sign
  • P: Pause the game

Extra Info

  • You must have .NET Framework installed to play this game. If you're on Windows it is very likely you already have it - but if you find yourself unable to run the game, you can download .NET here.
  • This game was made from scratch using FNA.
